info: tatar/kosmoplovci is a darkambient/noize/drone producer from serbia, working and releasing his work through kosmoplovci.net projects, including free audio releases and videos. his work has been widely recognized and featured in many of kosmoplovci.net releases, adding a lots to kosmoplovci global recognition as one of the most important freelance art/music/demoscene groups.  source: http://www.last.fm/music/tatar/
